steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET

steps.name: Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha

steps.name: Pull image from GHCR
steps.run: docker system prune -a --force && docker pull ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha

steps.name: Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha

steps.name: Pull image from GHCR
steps.run: docker system prune -a --volumes --force && docker pull ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha

steps.name: Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha oxsecurity/megalinter-worker-${{ matrix.flavor }}:alpha

steps.name: Invoke Mirror docker image workflow (Flavor image)
Invoke Mirror docker image workflow (Flavor worker image)
